009package Edges_Contours;
010
011import ij.ImagePlus;
012import ij.plugin.filter.PlugInFilter;
013import ij.process.ByteProcessor;
014import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
015import imagingbook.pub.color.edge.CannyEdgeDetector;
016
017/**
018 * This ImageJ shows the use of the Canny edge detector in
019 * its simplest form. Works on all image types.
020 * 
021 * See also {@link CannyEdgeDetector} and {@link Color_Edges.Color_Edges_Canny}.
022 * 
023 * @author WB
024 *
025 */
026public class Canny_Edges implements PlugInFilter {
027        
028        public int setup(String arg0, ImagePlus imp) {
029                return DOES_ALL + NO_CHANGES;
030        }
031
032        public void run(ImageProcessor ip) {
033                CannyEdgeDetector.Parameters params = new CannyEdgeDetector.Parameters();                       
034                params.gSigma = 3.0;    // sigma of Gaussian
035                params.hiThr  = 20.0;   // 20% of max. edge magnitude
036                params.loThr  = 5.0;    // 5% of max. edge magnitude
037                
038                CannyEdgeDetector detector = new CannyEdgeDetector(ip, params);
039                
040//              FloatProcessor eMag = detector.getEdgeMagnitude();
041//              FloatProcessor eOrt = detector.getEdgeOrientation();
042//              List<List<Point>> edgeTraces = detector.getEdgeTraces();
043                
044                ByteProcessor edge = detector.getEdgeBinary();
045                (new ImagePlus("Canny Edges", edge)).show();
046        }
047}
